heading.emphasis:

Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 10 , Ionian Sea: 27 , Ligurian Sea: 1 , Mediterranean Sea: 1 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 5 ;
total: 44 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 37 : 44 ;
total: 44 .
Remarks: This is an uncommon Mediterranean species reported only from the subtidal zone down to ca. 40 m bsl, inhabiting different types of sand and detritus and also found in marine caves.
